title: Day 1100
content:
# Day 1100

With this prompt you can do some great things "Make this Studio Ghibli-inspired"

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*thdWCjPxQBATKO0s8CLOeQ.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*9y-OwNNzifZ4zidr8EXDyw.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*cRmxRl-uLv1DJOs_ZO4wng.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*SD8c62dBMhnmxhLxcUo3tg.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*OaaE47-rky5f1-CCxYTPGg.png)

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*bmmCqIpGIrGYmxvA)

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1905082073666158981](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1905082073666158981)](https://miro.medium.com/1*kw4O2sjRTMHaxjSkympYrg.png)

![[https://x.com/ZFXtrading/status/1904890388772483077](https://x.com/ZFXtrading/status/1904890388772483077)](https://miro.medium.com/1*ZvdvsqmjyQyyeztqwPKESw.png)

Chat really felt like it went to a whole other level tonight. I'm genuinely blown away by how far these models have come. It brought back that same wonder I felt when they first dropped. Except now, everything is sharper, faster, and more intuitive.

What's even more exciting is this: just like social media converged around similar patterns, every model will eventually adopt these creative capabilities too. Editing and stylizing images with a single prompt is only going to get better from here.

How can you not be bullish on the future?

3/26/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
